Rooms.Name: The Mouth of an Obscured Cave
Navi, the Will of the Imari

Objects.Name: large iron pick
Objects.Description: A large iron pick has been dropped here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This large pick looks incredibly strong and heavy.  Small gashes andscratches in the metal show that it has been well used.

Objects.Name: blackened axe black glistening
Objects.Description: A glistening black axe is lying here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The runes are unreadable but unmistakably Khan-li in origin, testifying tothe evil magic bestowed upon this weapon.

Objects.Name: trickle water
Objects.Description: A trickle of water snakes its way slowly along the grooves in the floor.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This trickle of water is slightly murky from particles of dust and rubble,but does not look otherwise contaminated.

Objects.Name: phosphorescent mushroom fungi fungus
Objects.Description: @GA phosphorescent mushroom@g grows here, glowing faintly.@n
Objects.ExtraDescription: Smooth and fragile to the touch, this tiny domed mushroom glows faintly allover, as though it has tapped some internal source of light.

Objects.Name: dark red pool liquid
Objects.Description: @rDark red rivulets of liquid form a pool here.@n
Objects.ExtraDescription: This pool has the disturbing color of blood but appears to be watercontaminated with rusty particles of the mineral hematite from the surroundingrock.  This makes it gruesome to look at, and probably very inadvisable todrink.

Objects.Name: miniature corked bottle fairy tears
Objects.Description: A miniature corked bottle lies here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This tiny glimmering bottle is of fairy make, fragile crystal reflecting thesoft glow of the tears within.  An equally tiny cork seals the bottle, set witha perfectly minute aquamarine gem.

Objects.Name: ragged diary book 1
Objects.Description: A ragged book has been left here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: @G@gEntry 1@n   I have lost all interest in keeping this diary.  Since the sorceress hastaken over, life has not been worth writing about.  I shall instead recordanything I observe that may aid in her demise, though it will mean my deathshould this book be found.

Objects.Name: carcass stone
Objects.ShortDescription: the stone carcass of a sad-looking memlin
Objects.Description: The stone carcass of a memlin is lying here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This is the perfect form of a crumpled memlin corpse, one of the many diggersfound throughout the tunnels.  This creature has obviously met a most unnaturaldeath, as the corpse has fossilized into an eternal stone statue, an expressionof surprise and horror frozen into its features.

Objects.Name: goethite shackle
Objects.Description: A Goethite shackle lies here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This shackle has been twisted by some unnatural means out of goethitecrystals.  Dark as night, it glistens as though dripping with the black bloodof the Khan'li themselves.  It appears to be unlockable, except by a magic asstrong as that which wrought it.

Objects.Name: bejewelled crystal key
Objects.Description: A bejewelled crystal key is lying here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This sparkling key catches the light perfectly, giving it a rainbow hue.  Aperfectly round red beryll is set into the crystal, making it glow with magic.

Objects.Name: candystick
Objects.Description: A @rc@na@rn@nd@ry@ns@rt@ni@rc@nk lies here

Objects.Name: dark visored helmet
Objects.Description: A dark visored helmet is lying here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This dark helmet glimmers various shades of blue and green when turned inthe light.  The metal visor looks as though it offers excellent protectionthough making it somewhat harder to see, at least by any natural means.

Objects.Name: irridescent breastplate plate
Objects.Description: An irridescent breastplate is lying here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This breastplate is a deep inky black that shimmers irridescent green andblue at the slightest movement.  As well as being extraordinarily beautiful, itlooks as though it offers excellent defense.

Objects.Name: ink black boots ink-black
Objects.Description: A pair of ink-black boots stand here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: These thigh-high boots are plated and jointed at the knee, allowing forfreedom of movement.  A smooth glistening black they feel strangely cold, asthough some evil magic chills them.

Objects.Name: water leathery pouch water
Objects.Description: A leathery pouch is lying here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: Apparently made for holding water, this tan-colored leather has beentreated with some form of sticky resin, making it relatively leak-proof.

Objects.Name: fountain bubbling
Objects.Description: A large round bench sits in the center of the room.
Objects.ExtraDescription: Sculpted from glass and filled with smooth round pebbles, the watersplashing lazily from this fountain looks crystal clear.

Objects.Name: fragrant flower
Objects.Description: @wA @Mfragrant flower@n blossoms here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: Various shades of magenta and purple, this flower has a large golden stamenthat fills the air with a sweet perfume, making it a likely member of thetropical hibiscus family.

Objects.Name: test bracelet
Objects.Description: An unfinished object is lying here.

Objects.Name: griffin's tears clear bottle
Objects.Description: A bottle of clear liquid lies here.
Objects.ExtraKeyword: Griffin's Tears clear liquid small bottle
Objects.ExtraDescription: This small bottle is round with a cork tightly sealing it as if the liquidinside was very precious.

Objects.Name: floorboards loose
Objects.Description: A mouldy puddle stagnates in the corner.
Objects.ExtraDescription: These floorboards look a little loose, as though they have been pried openand set carefully back into place.

Objects.Name: white bone key
Objects.Description: A white key lies here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This tiny white key has been carefully carved from a single curved bone, thenotches are sharp enough to cut and have been polished until gleaming.

Objects.Name: bubbling hot spring
Objects.Description: A bubbling hot spring flows here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This spring flows lazily through the cavern, its heat evidenced by thewafting steam and bubbling water.

Objects.Name: small doll
Objects.Description: A small doll lies crumpled on the ground.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This little doll is obviously hand-made from old rags and stuffing,carelessly sewn together.  The eyes however, are made of some unknown materialand are chillingly life-like.  Mostly in the closed position, from time to timethey open as if by accident.

Objects.Name: fiery spine
Objects.Description: A @Rfiery spine@n lies here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This long sharp spine seems to glisten slightly as though recently hewn fromits animal owner.  Blood red and hot to the touch, a wisp of smoke curlscontinually around it as though some inner fire continually burns.

Objects.Name: skull stone massive dragon
Objects.ShortDescription: the massive stone skull of a dragon
Objects.Description: The massive stone skull of a dragon sits ominously on the altar.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This enormous stone skull appears to have come from an actual dragon corpse.Apparently once made of bone, it has long since petrified into smooth stone.Long jagged teeth frame the slightly open jaw, and the two immense eye socketsare empty, filled with an unnatural darkness.

Objects.Name: broken shard glass
Objects.Description: A broken shard of glass lies here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This glass appears to mirror something, dark swirling shapes lingering justbeneath the flawless surface.  Almost unnaturally black, it seems to whisper toyou, invoking the urge to pick it up and look closer.

Objects.Name: glowing blue shard glass
Objects.Description: @BA glowing blue shard of glass@n lies here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: Razor-sharp and glittering with uncanny beauty, this shard seems to reflectsome aspect of you, as indeed its mirror host once would have.  A delicatesilver chain, fine as spider-silk supports the jewel-like glass, silverywriting scrawled across the smooth surface, spelling the words: Healer, healthyself.

Objects.Name: glowing red shard glass
Objects.Description: @RA glowing red shard of glass@n lies here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: Razor-sharp and glittering with uncanny beauty, this shard seems to reflectsome aspect of you, as indeed its mirror host once would have.  A delicatesilver chain, fine as spider-silk supports the jewel-like glass, silverywriting scrawled across the smooth surface, spelling the words: Conqueror,conquer thyself.

Objects.Name: glowing green shard glass
Objects.Description: @GA glowing green shard of glass@n lies here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: Razor-sharp and glittering with uncanny beauty, this shard seems to reflectsome aspect of you, as indeed its mirror host once would have.  A delicatesilver chain, fine as spider-silk supports the jewel-like glass, silverywriting scrawled across the smooth surface, spelling the words: Deceiver, knowthyself.

Objects.Name: glowing purple shard glass
Objects.Description: @MA glowing purple shard of glass lies here.@n
Objects.ExtraDescription: Razor-sharp and glittering with uncanny beauty, this shard seems to reflectsome aspect of you, as indeed its mirror host once would have.  A delicatesilver chain, fine as spider-silk supports the jewel-like glass, silverywriting scrawled across the smooth surface, spelling the words: Seeker, seekthyself.

Objects.Name: test quiver
Objects.Description: A test quiver is lying here.

Objects.Name: test bow
Objects.Description: A test bow is lying here

Objects.Name: test arrow
Objects.Description: A test arrow is lying here.

Objects.Name: little bundle white flowers
Objects.ShortDescription: a little bundle of white flowers
Objects.Description: A little bundle of white flowers has been placed here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: These flowers have tiny star-shaped heads that seem an almost luminouswhite.  Delicate silver-veined leaves and pale green stems extend beneath thefragile petals, held together with a single scarlet ribbon.

Objects.Name: bright circle
Objects.Description: @CA bright circle of light glows from the floor.@n
Objects.ExtraDescription: This glowing circle has clear magical properties, its surface shimmering asthough it is not entirely in one place.  In fact, it seems almost like it couldfunction as some kind of portal.

Objects.Name: firebreather bottle vodka firebreather
Objects.Description: A bottle of vodka stands here.

Objects.Name: empty
Objects.Description: A buggy trigger is wreaking havoc here.

Objects.Name: suspended orb glowing water
Objects.Description: @CA suspended orb of glowing water@n
Objects.ExtraDescription: This shimmering orb ripples with beautiful patterns of unnatural light thatdance upon the surface of the water.  Amazingly the fluid holds itself in aperfect sphere, hovering as though weightless in the air.

Objects.Name: broken pick
Objects.Description: A broken pick lies discarded on the floor.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This pick seems newly built, though the iron head has already been shatteredas though it has been repeatedly struck against a material that will not yield.

Objects.Name: single black feather
Objects.Description: A single black feather lies on the ground.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This large and beautiful feather is perfectly black, glistening slightlyirridescent, streaks of blue and green glinting in any light.  Soft as silk andalmost as light as air, it probably once belonged to a raven or crow.

Objects.Name: apron stained wrinkled
Objects.Description: A wrinkled apron lies here, covered with various stains.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This looks like your average kitchen apron, though rather ragged andwell-used.  Several food stains cover the otherwise white material, and thescent of peppers and spices wafts from the fabric.  A large pocket hangs alongthe side, small crumbs falling through a hole in the bottom.

Objects.Name: swirling tor Tor
Objects.Description: A swirling Tor hovers here, distorting everything around it.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This massive black sphere hovers effortlessly in mid-air, strange colors andpatterns flickering and dancing over its surface.  The atmosphere around itseems unnatural, distortions spreading rhythmically out around it like ripplesin the very fabric of space.  A low vibrating pulse can also be felt, energyebbing and flowing as if some invisible heart was beating.

Objects.Name: sacrificial blade cruel silvery
Objects.Description: A cruel silvery blade glistens here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This long, curving blade is razor sharp and glistens silver in the light,though when examined carefully the metal that forged it can be seen to be black.Elegant runes glow faintly red though to the touch they are icy cold, chillingeven the tightly wound strips of hide that bind the handle.

Objects.Name: proud metal sculpture
Objects.Description: A proud metal sculpture stands unyieldingly in the center of the room.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This beautifully forged abstract metal sculpture is seamless and flowing asif still liquid, only it has cooled completely into an unmoldable image ofinterpretative art.  Stubbornly fixed in place, the curving contours of thesculpture seem to contrast its complete refusal to bend under any pressure.

Objects.Name: flickering flame
Objects.Description: A flickering flame hovers warily above the ground.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This large flame is the pure scarlet color of unpolluted fire, dancing andleaping almost frantically it casts its surroundings in and out of shadow.Though nothing supports it and nothing appears to be feeding it, it burns almostbrighter than any natural flame ever could.

Objects.Name: set silver balancing scales
Objects.ShortDescription: a set of silver balancing scales
Objects.Description: A set of silver scales tips continuously from one side to the other.
Objects.ExtraDescription: Expertly forged and polished until shimmering, these beautiful scales are anartistic expression of justice and moderation.  Simple and unembellished, theflat silver plates alternately raise and lower, invisible forces seeking to tipthe balance, whilst Navi, the will of the Imari seeks constantly to restore it.

Objects.Name: long simple garment piece white fabric
Objects.Description: A long piece of white fabric lies crumpled here.
Objects.ExtraKeyword: long simple garment piece white fabric
Objects.ExtraDescription: This simply sewn piece of flowing white cloth looks light to the touch andhas an almost airy floating quality to it.  Dull white, it is clean and orderlybut otherwise unremarkable.

Objects.Name: delicate piece white gown material
Objects.Description: A delicate piece of white material lies here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This fragile shimmering dress is made of fine silk, so delicate the slightestpull would tear it.  Two jewelled straps hold the flowing material in place, therest of it left to naturally cascade in smooth, shining folds.

Objects.Name: tiny opal pendant gold chain
Objects.Description: A tiny opal lies here, attached to a fragile gold chain.
Objects.ExtraDescription: A tiny fire opal lies embedded in a delicate circle of gold, its smooth whitesurface flecked with brilliant shades of scarlet and crimson.  A slight glowseems to come from it as though some inner source of light is shining through, afragile gold chain trailing from the tip of its gold setting.

Objects.Name: simple gray tunic
Objects.Description: A gray tunic is lying here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This modest garment is a light slate gray in color, made of delicate,flexible material and sealed down the front with tiny wooden buttons.

Objects.Name: rope-like cord belt
Objects.Description: A rope-like cord is lying here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This long woven cord has been woven from a very rough and durable brownmaterial, it seems it has been designed to serve as a tool belt, able to bearthe constant weight of heavy objects.

Objects.Name: faded brown shirt
Objects.Description: A faded brown shirt lies crumpled here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This short sleeved garment is made of very light and airy material that looksas though it were once deep chocolate brown, now faded through use and time.

Objects.Name: dusty white vest
Objects.Description: A dusty white vest lies forgotten here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This simple, loose-fitting vest is made of comfortable breathable material,well-suited for hot humid environments.  Apparently once a brilliant white, ithas faded and grayed with dust.

Objects.Name: worn leather pants
Objects.Description: A pair of worn leather pants lies discarded here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: These durable pants have been made from some type of thin hide, well-madethey have nonetheless been used far beyond their time, leaving them ragged andworn through in places.

Objects.Name: pair tan trousers
Objects.Description: A pair of tan trousers lie here gathering dust.
Objects.ExtraDescription: These light colored trousers are partially darkened by patches of dried mudand dust, obviously on the verge of wearing through they are nonetheless verylight and unrestrictive.

Objects.Name: loose-fitting breeches
Objects.Description: Some loose-fitting breeches have been dumped here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: These large breeches have been designed for maximum ease of movement,comfortable and light material delicately sewn to hold in place withoutrestricting.  Well-used and grimy, they are nonetheless intact.

Objects.Name: some tattered sandals
Objects.Description: Some tattered sandals lie here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: These roughly stitched sandals seem to have been crudely thrown together frombits and pieces of left over hide.  The thread is old and worn and the entirepiece looks on the verge of falling apart.

Objects.Name: plain leather shoes
Objects.Description: Some plain leather shoes have been dropped here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: Dusty and ragged, these worn out shoes are reaching the end of their possibleuse.  Frayed stitching is already beginning to unwind, and patches in the soleare threadbare.

Objects.Name: frayed belt
Objects.Description: A frayed belt is lying here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This belt looks almost about to snap, pieces of unravelling thread stickingout here and there like spines.  A simple wooden buckle fastens it together,layers of dust and grime covering the carved patternwork.

Objects.Name: threadbare boots
Objects.Description: Some threadbare boots lie discarded here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: Made of rawhide and stitched tightly with black threads, there seems to bemore clumped mud making up this footwear than fabric.  Pieces of twine arecarelessly tied around in various places, an obvious attempt to hold themtogether for longer.

Objects.Name: dirty pieces wound cloth
Objects.Description: Some dirty pieces of wound cloth lie here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This long piece of filthy cloth has been wound into a sort of bandage, itlooks as though it serves to protect the palms from the chafing of heavy tools.

Objects.Name: crate dusty storage
Objects.Description: A dusty storage crate stands against the wall.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This small wooden box looks like it once held tools although now there is notmuch to be seen through the cracked pieces of wood but dust and the occasionalspider.

Objects.Name: blue patchwork dress
Objects.Description: A blue patchwork dress lies here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This simple but pretty dress has been sewn together from patches of leftovermaterial.  As such there are many shades of blue, some floral, some patterned,and others plain, making the garment a little unusual but still quite pleasingto look at.

Objects.Name: peach colored dress
Objects.Description: A peach-colored dress lies crumpled here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This soft dress is a little faded, but still a pretty peach color, most ofthe delicate stitching and fabric intact.  Mostly unremarkable, there is aslightly electric feel to it as though the weaver infused some magicalproperties.

Objects.Name: silver-leafed book time
Objects.Description: A silver-leafed book lies here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This beautiful shimmering book is bound with leather and overlaid with finesilver leafing.  Carefully scrawled letters glow vaguely phosphorescent on thecover, spelling out Book of Time.  There appears to be three chapters (look 1,2, or 3).

Objects.Name: strip white meat
Objects.Description: A strip of white meat has been left here to rot.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This long piece of white flesh is fresh and healthy-looking.  Apparently somesort of poultry, it smells a bit like...  chicken?

Objects.Name: piece salted dried meat
Objects.ShortDescription: a piece of salted, dried meat
Objects.Description: A piece of salted, dried meat lies here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: While this preserved piece of red meat does not look particularly delicious,it seems to be in good condition and a good source of nourishment.

Objects.Name: pheasant mushroom meat pie
Objects.Description: A meat pie has been left here to spoil.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This freshly baked pie is light and crispy on the outside, the delicioussmell of gravy-soaked meat and mushrooms steaming through the pastry shell.

Objects.Name: boiled potato
Objects.Description: A boiled potato lies here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This slightly mud-stained vegetable looks not long plucked from the ground.Recently boiled, it is still somewhat warm to the touch.  A sprinkling of saltcoats its light brown skin.

Objects.Name: fresh carrot
Objects.Description: A fresh carrot lies here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This fresh carrot has been recently pulled and rinsed off, a layer ofsparkling water still clinging to its bright orange surface.  Long green leavesdangle from one end, a stark contrast in color to the rest of it.

Objects.Name: small piece meat
Objects.Description: A small piece of meat lies rotting here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This small piece of red meat is not the most appetizing in appearance, but isprobably quite nourishing nonetheless.

Objects.Name: scarlet fire dress
Objects.Description: A scarlet dress lies here, wreathed in flame.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This blazing gown has been wrought by some powerful magic out of ragingscarlet flame.  Shimmering with intense heat and energy, the tongues of firedance frantically through the magical fabric as though seeking escape.  Thedelicate shoulder straps are made of glittering rubies linked with gold, thegems glowing with firelight as the dress crackles and burns.

Objects.Name: crystal delicate nymph ring
Objects.Description: A delicate crystal ring lies here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This delicate ring is made of pure flowing crystal, carved into the tiny formof a naked ice nymph, slender arms and legs curled around to grasp the wearer'sfinger.  Its tiny face has a tranquil expression, two aquamarine gems glowing aseyes, softly illuminating the rest of her smoothly feminine features.

Objects.Name: folded note
Objects.Description: A folded note lies dropped here.

Objects.Name: glistening obsidian key
Objects.Description: A glistening obsidian key lies here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This dark magical key has been wrought from pure black obsidian, shimmeringas though wet it has a strangely hot surface, as though some invisible firewarmed it.

Objects.Name: icy mana ring
Objects.Description: An icy ring lies here, glowing faintly.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This cool glassy ring has been forged from a silvery metal and interwovenwith blue crystal, the two substances spiralling around each other in anever-ending circle, a symbol of the flowing of unseen forces.  It looks asthough it may impart some powerful magic unto the wearer if@c used@n.

Objects.Name: Goethite staff flame fire
Objects.ShortDescription: a Goethite staff alight with flame
Objects.Description: A Goethite staff lies here, topped with flickering fire.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This spiralling glossy staff has been carved and polished from pure Goethitecrystal.  Black as night and warm to the touch, its slender rod forms into anoval platform upon which a fire elemental dances.  Blazing with fury and power,the tiny creature sparks with almost unnatural energy, its frenzied movementssending wisps of smoke into the air.

Objects.Name: test object
Objects.Description: A test object lies here.

Objects.Name: Goethite staff flame fire
Objects.ShortDescription: a Goethite staff alight with flame
Objects.Description: A Goethite staff lies here, topped with flickering fire.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This spiralling glossy staff has been carved and polished from pure Goethitecrystal.  Black as night and warm to the touch, its slender rod forms into anoval platform upon which a fire elemental dances.  Blazing with fury and power,the tiny creature sparks with almost unnatural energy, its frenzied movementssending wisps of smoke into the air.

Objects.Name: test ash arrow
Objects.Description: An ash arrow is lying here.

Objects.Name: test silver arrow
Objects.Description: A silver arrow is lying here.

Objects.Name: poison arrow
Objects.Description: A arrow lies here, tipped with poison.

Objects.Name: birthday cake
Objects.Description: A birthday cake stands here, flickering with candles.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This birthday cake is Detta's, created on August 5th, to commemorate her lastever day of being 22 years old.  *breaks down and sobs about not being old*

Objects.Name: xxxspiderball spider ball
Objects.Description: A spider ball sits here.
